attributes.action: Prohibit the teaching, broadcasting or advertising of any religious information or material.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I schools we teach children what to believe in before they are old enough to decide for themselves.  Such brainwashing is cruel and reduces the ability of the child to think independently.

There are TV programmes promoting religion.  There is religious advertising on radio.  There are religious crazy people yelling in the street and trying to shove a leaflet in your hand.

This needs to stop.  People should be allowed to develop their beliefs out of their own free will.  Let them walk their own path and not one dictated by a dodgy old book that is drummed into your head as soon as you are old enough to talk.
